name: Iknal
desc: A miner from the Children of Echoes.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Almost every miner dreams of owning a tool capable of shattering all obstacles and forging a path forward â€” and Iknal is no exception. She wove this desire together with an exotic rumor she once heard and incorporated both into her Genius Invokation TCG deck...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the Action Phase begins: All of your characters are affected by 2 instances of Cryo.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Golden Wolflord
customize.desc:
"King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord

A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

value.name: Saurian Claw Succulent
value.desc: A succulent shaped like the paw of a great animal.
